SECTIONS.CONTENT_1: Welcome to the Map of Pi app, developed by the Map of Pi team in collaboration with the Pi Community. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our mobile application.

SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_1_2: We may collect information about your device, including device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_2_2_1: Vendors registering on the platform may be required to provide business information, including business name, location, and contact details.

SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_2_1: We may use your contact information to send you updates, notifications, and promotional messages related to the Map of Pi app.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_3_3_1: We collect and analyze data to improve the performance, features, and functionality of the app.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_1_1: User information may be shared with vendors for order fulfillment and communication purposes.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_4_2_1: We may share information with third-party service providers for app functionality, analytics, and payment processing.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_5_1: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_6_1: You can update or delete your account information through the app settings. You may also opt-out of promotional communications.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_7_1: We may update this Privacy Policy as necessary. The latest version will be posted on our website or within the app.
SECTIONS.CONTENT_8_1: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us
